rule.ruleDesc: Mandatory fields for Change Plan and Schedule
rule.condition: current.phase in $L.file.save="Risk and Impact Analysis" or current.phase in $L.file.save="Plan and Schedule" or current.phase in $L.file.save="Build and Test" or current.phase in $L.file.save="Authorization (CAB)" or current.phase in $L.file.save="Project Initiation"
rule.conditionDesc: ( Phase in SavedRecord = "Risk and Impact Analysis" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Plan and Schedule" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Build and Test" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Authorization (CAB)" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Project Initiation")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Risk and Impact Analysis</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Plan and Schedule</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Build and Test</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Authorization (CAB)</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Project Initiation</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Mandatory fields for Change Plan and Schedule (when ( Phase in SavedRecord = "Risk and Impact Analysis" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Plan and Schedule" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Build and Test" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Authorization (CAB)" OR Phase in SavedRecord = "Project Initiation"))
